title: No way to play 5 premades competitive?
body:
Hi, are there going to be team rankeds again or flex queue player limit adjusted up to 4 or even 5 players?
Currently the only way to play as 4 or 5 players premade is normal queue, which does not have
that proper, competitive feel...

replies.body: you can have 5 players in flex . . .
Wait...what? Damn, so it has to regard only EUNE server. This is strange though.

> [{quoted}](name=SNSD Sunnny,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=TpBldjQh,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-12T19:36:31.609+0000)
>
> flex is not competitive though

>ranked
>not competitive
pick one and only one
